admiral-ackbar-commander.author: Fantasy Flight Games
admiral-ackbar-commander.name: Admiral Ackbar
admiral-ackbar-commander.ability: Before a friendly ship’s Attack step, it may choose to attack from only its left and right hull zones this round. If it does, it may add 2 red dice to its attack pool while attacking a ship.

admiral-ozzel-commander.author: Fantasy Flight Games
admiral-ozzel-commander.name: Admiral Ozzel
admiral-ozzel-commander.ability: During each friendly ship’s Determine Course step, it may change its speed by 1.

admiral-piett.author: Fantasy Flight Games
admiral-piett.name: Admiral Piett
admiral-piett.ability: When a friendly ship spends only a command token to resolve a command, you may exhaust this card. If you do, that ship resolves that command as if it had spent a dial of the same type instead.

anakin-skywalker.author: Atomic Mass Games
anakin-skywalker.name: Anakin Skywalker
anakin-skywalker.ability: While a friendly ship is attacking a ship, if the defender is at distance 1-5 of at least 2 other friendly ships, 1 other friendly ship at distance 1-5 of the defender may spend 1 defense token. If it does, the attacker may reroll up to 3 dice.

count-dooku.author: Fantasy Flight Games
count-dooku.name: Count Dooku
count-dooku.ability: You must choose at least 2 types of command tokens for this card. At the start of each Ship Phase, you may discard 1 command token from this card. If you do, each enemy ship gains a raid token matching that command token.

darth-vader-commander.author: Fantasy Flight Games
darth-vader-commander.name: Darth Vader
darth-vader-commander.ability: While a friendly ship is attacking a ship, it may spend 1 defense token to reroll any number of dice in its attack pool.

emperor-palpatine.author: Fantasy Flight Games
emperor-palpatine.name: Emperor Palpatine
emperor-palpatine.ability: When an enemy ship or unique squadron declares you as the target of an attack, it must spend 1 of its defense tokens (if able).

general-dodonna.author: Fantasy Flight Games
general-dodonna.name: General Dodonna
general-dodonna.ability: Before an enemy ship is dealt a faceup damage card, look at the top 4 cards of the damage deck, place 1 on top of the deck and discard the others.

general-rieekan.author: Fantasy Flight Games
general-rieekan.name: General Rieekan
general-rieekan.ability: Once per round, when a friendly ship or friendly unique squadron is destroyed, it remains in the play area and is treated as if it was not destroyed until the end of the Status Phase.

grand-moff-tarkin.author: Fantasy Flight Games
grand-moff-tarkin.name: Grand Moff Tarkin
grand-moff-tarkin.ability: At the start of each Ship Phase, you may choose 1 command. Each friendly ship gains a command token matching that command.

electronic-countermeasures.author: Fantasy Flight Games
electronic-countermeasures.name: Electronic Countermeasures
electronic-countermeasures.ability: While defending you may exhaust this card to spend 1 defense token that your opponent targeted with an :accuracy: result.

all-fighters-follow-me.author: Fantasy Flight Games
all-fighters-follow-me.name: All Fighters, Follow Me!
all-fighters-follow-me.ability: At the start of the Ship Phase, you may discard this card or spend a :squadron: token. If you do, until the end of the round, the speed of each squadron that a friendly ship activates is increased by 1, to a maximum of 5, until the end of that squadron's activation.

entrapment-formation.author: Fantasy Flight Games
entrapment-formation.name: Entrapment Formation!
entrapment-formation.ability: At the start of the Ship Phase, you may discard this card or spend a :nav: token. If you do, until the end of the round, each friendly ship may change its speed by 1 during its Determine Course step.

intensify-firepower.author: Fantasy Flight Games
intensify-firepower.name: Intensify Firepower!
intensify-firepower.ability: At the start of the Ship Phase, you may discard this card or spend a :confire: token. If you do, until the end of the round, while each friendly ship is attacking a ship, it may change 1 die to a face with 1 :hit: icon and no other icons.

shields-to-maximum.author: Fantasy Flight Games
shields-to-maximum.name: Shields to Maximum!
shields-to-maximum.ability: At the start of the Ship Phase, you may discard this card or spend a :repair: token. If you do, until the end of the round, before a friendly ship reveals a command, it may recover 1 shield.

heavy-ion-emplacements.author: Fantasy Flight Games
heavy-ion-emplacements.name: Heavy Ion Emplacements
heavy-ion-emplacements.ability: BLUE :crit: : You may exhaust this card. If you do, the defending hull zone and each adjacent hull zone loses 1 shield.

overload-pulse.author: Fantasy Flight Games
overload-pulse.name: Overload Pulse
overload-pulse.ability: BLUE :crit: : Exhaust all of the defender's defense tokens.

expanded-hangar-bay.author: Fantasy Flight Games
expanded-hangar-bay.name: Expanded Hangar Bay
expanded-hangar-bay.ability: Your squadron value is increased by 1.

admiral-montferrat.author: Fantasy Flight Games
admiral-montferrat.name: Admiral Montferrat
admiral-montferrat.ability: While defending against a ship, if your speed is 3 or higher, the attack is treated as obstructed. After you execute a maneuver, if you overlapped a ship, discard this card.

admiral-ozzel.author: Fantasy Flight Games
admiral-ozzel.name: Admiral Ozzel
admiral-ozzel.ability: At the start of the first round, you may execute a speed-1 maneuver.

captain-needa.author: Fantasy Flight Games
captain-needa.name: Captain Needa
captain-needa.ability: At the start of the first round, you may replace 1 of your defense tokens with an :evade: defense token.

commander-gherant.author: Fantasy Flight Games
commander-gherant.name: Commander Gherant
commander-gherant.ability: While you are defending, the attacker cannot resolve critical effects. After you perform an attack against a ship, discard this card.

darth-vader.author: Fantasy Flight Games
darth-vader.name: Darth Vader
darth-vader.ability: While a friendly ship at distance 1-5 attacking a ship, it may discard 1 of its :commander: or :officer: cards (other than Darth Vader) to reroll any number of dice in its attack pool.

defense-liaison.author: Fantasy Flight Games
defense-liaison.name: Defense Liaison
defense-liaison.ability: Before you reveal a command, you may spend 1 command token to change that command to a :nav: or :repair: command.

director-krennic.author: Fantasy Flight Games
director-krennic.name: Director Krennic
director-krennic.ability: :confire:: While attacking at medium-long range, if you spent a :confire: dial, you may also reroll any number of red dice in your attack pool. If you spent a :confire: token, you may also reroll up to 2 red dice in your attack pool.

engineering-captain.author: Fantasy Flight Games
engineering-captain.name: Engineering Captain
engineering-captain.ability: Before you reveal a command, you may change that command to a :repair: command.

lando-calrissian-officer.author: Fantasy Flight Games
lando-calrissian-officer.name: Lando Calrissian
lando-calrissian-officer.ability: While defending, during the Spend Defense Tokens Step, you may discard this card to force the attacker to reroll 1 or more dice of your choice.

leia-organa.author: Fantasy Flight Games
leia-organa.name: Leia Organa
leia-organa.ability: When you reveal a command, you may choose another friendly ship at distance 1-5 and change that ship's top command to your revealed command.

lira-wessex.author: Fantasy Flight Games
lira-wessex.name: Lira Wessex
lira-wessex.ability: When you are dealt a faceup damage card, you may spend 1 :repair: token to flip that card facedown (without resolving its effect).

navigation-officer.author: Fantasy Flight Games
navigation-officer.name: Navigation Officer
navigation-officer.ability: Before you reveal a command, you may change that command to a :navigate: command.

support-officer.author: Fantasy Flight Games
support-officer.name: Support Officer
support-officer.ability: At the start of the Command Phase, you may discard this card to discard all of your command dials.

tactical-expert.author: Fantasy Flight Games
tactical-expert.name: Tactical Expert
tactical-expert.ability: Before you reveal a command, you may change that command to a :concentrate fire: command.

walex-blissex.author: Fantasy Flight Games
walex-blissex.name: Walex Blissex
walex-blissex.ability: When you activate, you may discard this card to recover 1 of your discarded defense tokens.

weapons-liaison.author: Fantasy Flight Games
weapons-liaison.name: Weapons Liaison
weapons-liaison.ability: Before you reveal a command, you may spend 1 command token to change that command to a :confire: or :squadron: command.

wing-commander.author: Fantasy Flight Games
wing-commander.name: Wing Commander
wing-commander.ability: Before you reveal a command, you may change that command to a :squadron: command.

wullf-yularen.author: Fantasy Flight Games
wullf-yularen.name: Wullf Yularen
wullf-yularen.ability: When you spend a command token, you may exhaust this card to gain 1 command token of the same type

assault-concussion-missiles.author: Fantasy Flight Games
assault-concussion-missiles.name: Assault Concussion Missiles
assault-concussion-missiles.ability: BLACK :crit: : Exhaust this card. Each hull zone adjacent to the defending hull zone suffers 1 damage.

nav-team.author: Fantasy Flight Games
nav-team.name: Nav Team
nav-team.ability: :nav: : Your :nav: tokens can either change your speed or increase 1 yaw value by 1.

admonition.author: Fantasy Flight Games
admonition.name: Admonition
admonition.ability: While defending, during the Spend Defense Tokens step, you may discard a readied defense token to cancel 1 attack die.

annihilator.author: Fantasy Flight Games
annihilator.name: Annihilator
annihilator.ability: While attacking a squadron, you may reroll 1 attack die.

avenger.author: Fantasy Flight Games
avenger.name: Avenger
avenger.ability: While attacking, you may exhaust this card. If you do, the defender cannot spend more than 1 exhausted defense token during this attack.

defiance.author: Fantasy Flight Games
defiance.name: Defiance
defiance.ability: While attacking a ship that has already activated this round, add 1 die of any color to your attack pool.

devastator.author: Fantasy Flight Games
devastator.name: Devastator
devastator.ability: Once per round, while attacking from your front hull zone, you may add 1 blue die to your attack pool for each of your discarded defense tokens.

dodonnas-pride.author: Fantasy Flight Games
dodonnas-pride.name: Dodonna's Pride
dodonnas-pride.ability: BLUE :crit: Cancel all attack dice to deal 1 faceup damage card to the defender.

dominator.author: Fantasy Flight Games
dominator.name: Dominator
dominator.ability: When attacking at close-medium range, you may spend up to 2 shields from any of your hull zones to add that number of blue dice to your attack pool.

eclipse.author: Fantasy Flight Games
eclipse.name: Eclipse
eclipse.ability: When an enemy ship overlaps you, the enemy ship suffers a faceup damage card instead of a facedown damage card.

executor.author: Fantasy Flight Games
executor.name: Executor
executor.ability: You can be assigned any number of command tokens of any types, instead of a number of command tokens equal to your command value.

foresight.author: Fantasy Flight Games
foresight.name: Foresight
foresight.ability: When you resolve the :evade: defense effect, you can affect 1 additional die. When you resolve the :redirect: defense effect, you can choose 1 additional adjacent hull zone to suffer damage.

home-one.author: Fantasy Flight Games
home-one.name: Home One
home-one.ability: While another friendly ship at distance 1-5 is attacking, it may change 1 die to a face with an :accuracy: icon.

impetuous.author: Fantasy Flight Games
impetuous.name: Impetuous
impetuous.ability: At the end of your Attack Step, choose 1 of your hull zones. You may perform an attack against 1 enemy squadron from that hull zone, even if you have already attacked from that zone this round.

independence.author: Fantasy Flight Games
independence.name: Independence
independence.ability: :squadron: Each squadron you activate may increase its speed to 4 until the end of its activation. Squadrons that change speed in this way cannot attack this activation.

instigator.author: Fantasy Flight Games
instigator.name: Instigator
instigator.ability: Enemy squadrons at distance 1 are treated as if they are engaged by 2 additional squadrons, even if they are not currently engaged.

ravager.author: Fantasy Flight Games
ravager.name: Ravager
ravager.ability: :confire:: Your :confire: tokens can either reroll 1 attack die or add 1 die to your attack pool. If you add a die, that die must be of a color already in your attack pool.

redemption.author: Fantasy Flight Games
redemption.name: Redemption
redemption.ability: When a friendly ship at distance 1-5 resolves a :repair: command, it gains 1 additional engineering point.

relentless.author: Fantasy Flight Games
relentless.name: Relentless
relentless.ability: The total number of command dials that must be assigned to your ship during the Command Phase is reduced by 1.

enhanced-armament.author: Fantasy Flight Games
enhanced-armament.name: Enhanced Armament
enhanced-armament.ability:
_Modification_. 
The battery armaments for your left and right hull zones are increased by 1 red die.

h9-turbolasers.author: Fantasy Flight Games
h9-turbolasers.name: H9 Turbolasers
h9-turbolasers.ability:
_Modification_. 
While attacking, you may change 1 die face with a :hit: or :crit: icon to a face with an :accuracy: icon.

gunnery-team.author: Fantasy Flight Games
gunnery-team.name: Gunnery Team
gunnery-team.ability: :confire:: The next attack you perform this activation can be performed from this hull zone. Each of your hull zones cannot target the same ship or squadron more than once during your activation.
